Author: warmcorgi53
Text: I just eat dinner before and chew gum and use that as an excuse to not eat during the movie

Author: lyn-xii
Text: it's pretty common to sneak food into movies bc the prices are sooo high there, I wouldn't worry too much about it.. my suggestion is if they have these where you live, albanese sugar free gummy bears (I get them at walmart) are 70 cal per serving or like 220 for the whole bag but I've heard they can make you poo! they're really tasty. or for a salty snack I know theres mini bags of chips that have like 160-220 cals as well.
